channel.title: Theme Demo on Kaitlyn Hobbs
channel.description: Recent content in Theme Demo on Kaitlyn Hobbs

item.title: Research Report: Improving access to palliative care.
item.description: As part of the Fall 2023 Research Training Program through Charity Entrepreneurship, 16 of us from across the globe met virtually to research and discuss the topic of effective giving over 11-weeks. In it, we learned ways to prioritise cause areas, compared different intervention ideas within a single cause area, and evaluated plausibility and cost-effectiveness of seemingly promising new interventions. This report investigates the plausibility of starting a new charity increases access to at-home palliative care in Sub-saharan Africa.

item.title: Research Report: Mass media for increasing caregiver awareness.
item.description: As part of the Fall 2023 Research Training Program through Charity Entrepreneurship, 16 of us from across the globe met virtually to research and discuss the topic of effective giving over 11-weeks. In it, we learned ways to prioritise cause areas, compared different intervention ideas within a single cause area, and evaluated plausibility and cost-effectiveness of seemingly promising new interventions. This report investigates the plausibility of starting a new charity that leverages mass media to increase health-seeking and health-protecting behaviours in low-middle income countries.

item.title: Spatial Access Measures.
item.description: The Spatial Access Measures (SAM) are a result of work commissioned by Infrastructure Canada to develop data and analytical frameworks for assessing the landscape of public transportation in Canada.

item.title: Open Database Development: Linkable Open Data Environment.
item.description: The Linkable Open Data Environment (LODE) is a government open data initiative to consolidate micro-data into singular, connective, geospatial databases. I contributed to the development of the LODE production pipeline and dissemination of several complete databases including: The Open Database of Infrastructure (ODI) - May 8, 2023 — Version 1.0 The Open Database of Education Facilities (ODEF) - November 28, 2022 — Version 2.1 & April 9, 2021 — Version 2.

item.title: Real-Time Local Business Conditions Index.
item.description: Highlighting several population centres in Canada, the Real-time Local Business Conditions Index (RTLBCI) is an experimental indicator of business operations that leverages public and proprietary micro-data.

item.title: Capstone Project: Covid-19 Outbreak Analysis.
item.description: Student Capstone Project Highlight Link to heading Our team of three developed a provincial database of long‐term care (LTC) homes and modelled COVID‐19 outbreaks in British Columbia. This work, completed as part of a capstone project at The University of British Columbia (UBC) under guidance from Statistics Canada, has been highlighted by UBC.
